source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT DISTINCT LoadgroupID, LoadOrder FROM process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 ORDER BY LoadOrder

activities.name: Lookup_Full_ExcelFiles_Distributeur
activities.description: Lookup the tables from the source database which are used in the full copy.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * 
	FROM process.ProcessView 
WHERE SourceConnectionID = 2 AND
	 (TemplateName = 'FULL' OR IncrementalLoad = 0)
